summary: Adds a Chest in High Hrothgar Courtyard that has DMRA Snowbunny Ski Suit. Please enjoy the humor.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Snowbunny Ski Suit
Author: Edhildil
04,09,2018
ver1

Adds a Chest in High Hrothgar Courtyard that has DMRA Snowbunny Ski Suit. Please enjoy the humor.

I like to ski off the Throat of the World, especially with Whirlwind Sprint, it's the best! So many variations of totally eating it!
I've actually found a few runs that are survivable down the mountain. I include a map of the ski runs. Sort of.
If you think you have what it takes to survive the turmoils and tulmults of being Dragonborn then you might be on to something.
Some people like to watch, other people like to compete. Challenge yourself for a race of the face of the Throat of the World!

This mod can also induce a hypnotic "cross country skiing" effect of emmersion during play if traveling on foot in third person view in the snow.

I encourage you to post pics/vids of your stunts!

You'll need CBBE textures.

Highly Recommended: Death Cam Duration Options.

If you want Bodyslide, UNP, 7base, HDT physics, etc, I'm not going to do it, but if you can, you can. Just credit me.


Tools used:
=======
Blender 2.49b
Gimp 2
Nifscope
author: Edhildil
